title: Mokomi
overview: Shimizu Mokomi has the ability to understand the feelings of things with no emotions. This includes stuffed toys, stones, and even plants. Due to her mysterious ability, Mokomi has been living in her own world and does not interact with anyone. One day, Mokomi decides to step out of her world and grow up while gathering various experiences. Her sudden change has also influenced her family members who each has their own worries.
